items.content_html: Wer ist dieser Uptown Frank und wie findet er immer einen Parkplatz?
items.content_text: Wer ist dieser Uptown Frank und wie findet er immer einen Parkplatz?
Everybody is familiar. Everything is available.

items.content_html: Bald werden sie den Menschen Computerchips in die Gehirne einpflanzen und deren Output “Artisanal Intelligence” nennen. (Begriff absichtlich vorher nicht gegooglet.)

items.title: Keep ruining everything.
items.content_html:
“It’s unclear exactly for what Crystal and Ryan might be reuniting. With the 2025 Super Bowl just weeks away, some fans in the comment section speculated the pair may have teamed up for a commercial. Others hoped for a sequel and a return to their characters of Harry Burns and Sally Albright.”

Meg Ryan, Billy Crystal Tease ‘When Harry Met Sally’ Reunion
items.content_text:
> "It's unclear exactly for what Crystal and Ryan might be reuniting. With the 2025 Super Bowl just weeks away, some fans in the comment section speculated the pair may have teamed up for a commercial. Others hoped for a sequel and a return to their characters of Harry Burns and Sally Albright." 

[Meg Ryan, Billy Crystal Tease 'When Harry Met Sally' Reunion](https://www.today.com/popculture/movies/meg-ryan-billy-crystal-reunion-when-harry-met-sally-rcna188828)
